description.text: How does use-to-earn reward you if you keep your TiUSD balance in your wallet?
In principle, the more and longer TiUSD you hold, the more rewards you will earn.

The use-to-earn module will scan per second your TiUSD balance and calculate how many rewards you'll earn in the same way as a staking pool does. Hence, the rewards will be distributed to you as per seconds.
